slogan: Step onto the path – Stay on track!
name_instructions: Enter your first and last name using only letters.
username_error: Please, the '-' character should not be at the beginning or end of the username.
username_instructions: Spaces, emojis, and offensive words are not allowed.
username_rules: Only letters, numbers, and the '-' character are allowed.
timezone_instructions: To receive tasks at the correct time, enter a country or city name and select the appropriate time zone.
